collection.title: The Art of Photography
collection.name: Vivian Kung Haga
collection.description: There has been a long debate around photography as a science or an art form. These images speak to the art of photography and explore the themes of beauty, creativity, imagination, and the mysterious.

collection.title: Triangles, Lines, Circles and Shapes. Oh No!
collection.name: Vivian Kung Haga
collection.description: These images play with the ideas of geometry and speak to how versatile photography can be as a visual art form.
